splash.splashContent: This Isolation & Treatment Center application uses your current location in order to produce and provide you with the best user experience and results.

config.editorDescription: Search for an address or locate on map
config.noFeatureFoundMessage: Unfortunately we couldn't find any Isolation Centers near you yet. Please reach out to your Doctor and seek for more information and help. or Dial Toll-Free Number 2-0-1-9

about.aboutContent:
Isolation Center is a location finding tool to help residents of Zimbabwe easily find the nearest Isolation & Treatment centers around them in the process of fighting the spread of COVID-19 and making sure people get treatment in time. 

Kindly note that the Isolation Centers provided on the application are NOT the only locations providing Isolation and Treatment in Zimbabwe. We've only managed to map out and provide the locations of the centers that have been since confirmed and published on the Ministry of Health & Childcare Twitter handle. 

Provinces with provided Locations are:
  • Midlands
  • Matebeleland North
  • Mashonaland West
More locations to be provided in due course. 

This service has been proudly brought to you by African Surveyors Connect under the COVID-19 Information Dissemination project. You an also access the COVID-19 Statistical Data Center and Resources
